title: What do you think of Axl Rose? - Quora

response.answer_text: TBH,he has always seemed like a bit of an asshole in his personal life and even moment s in his career,but as a singer and front man he is probably one of the best in his genre of hard rock hair band heavy metal even today at his age I must admit,although I'm not a GNR fan.
His covers of AC/DC are pretty good tbh
